amendment.description: To require a report on the vulnerability of large sports and entertainment facilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1359 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1359 proposed by Senator Byrd for Senator Edwards. (consideration: CR S9783-9785; text: CR S9784) To require a report on the vulnerability of large sports and entertainment facilities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1359 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1359 proposed by Senator Byrd for Senator Edwards.
